name: Spinning Arrow Lift (clockwise)
desc: A spinning Arrow Lift from Yoshi's Island. It stops spinning and moves in the direction the arrow points when Mario jumps on it. If it hits a wall, the direction inverts. It spins clockwise.

name: Spinning Arrow Lift (counter-clockwise)
desc: A spinning Arrow Lift from Yoshi's Island. It stops spinning and moves in the direction the arrow points when Mario jumps on it. If it hits a wall, the direction inverts. It spins counter-clockwise.

name: Blue Spinning Arrow Lift (clockwise)
desc: A spinning Arrow Lift from Yoshi's Island. It stops spinning and moves in the direction the arrow points when Mario jumps on it. If it hits a wall, the direction inverts. It spins clockwise, and disappears after some time once stood on.

name: Blue Spinning Arrow Lift (counter-clockwise)
desc: A spinning Arrow Lift from Yoshi's Island. It stops spinning and moves in the direction the arrow points when Mario jumps on it. If it hits a wall, the direction inverts. It spins counter-clockwise, and disappears after some time once stood on.

name: Red `!' Switch (dynamic)
desc: A red switch from Yoshi's Island that cannot be moved. It activates the blue POW timer.

name: Chomp Rock (dynamic)
desc: A rollable Chomp Rock that uses dynamic GFX. It can destroy brick blocks (normal object 07).

name: ...alternate palette
desc: A rollable Chomp Rock that uses dynamic GFX. It can destroy brick blocks (normal object 07).

name: Blowhard (dynamic)
desc: A Blowhard from Yoshi's Island. It aims at and shoots happy Needlenose projectiles at Mario.

name: Floating Rock (dynamic)
desc: A Floating Rock from Yoshi's Island that uses dynamic GFX. It tilts to the side when Mario stands on it.
